Currently Ant Mail task doesn't provide the below operation. 1. Using message as well as messagefile at a time. 2. formatting message using HTML tags(eg.
) or \n. Due to above reason its not possible to send email formatted as we need. Please add one of the functionality. 1. Task should be provided to send formatted email using HTML tags. 2. Allow to use 'message' as well as 'messagefile' attributes.
